price: (Saa Da no) onipa biara bεba (atemmuo mu) a (Soro abͻfoͻ a) ͻreka nesoͻ ne (Soro abͻfoͻ a) ͻrebedi (neho) adanseε ka neho.
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wajāat kullu nafsin maʿahā sāiqun washahīdun
